sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
The herbal of divinity, or The dead arising from the dust to confute the hereticks of these times that say, there is no resurrection : in several sermons / by John Simpson ... Simpson, John.
[4], 153, [1], 305 [i.e. 303] p.
Printed for Sa: Speed, at the printing-press in Paul's Church-yard, London : 1659.
"The resurrection is one of the twelve signes in the Christian zodiack." Numbers 198 and 199 not used in paging. Imperfect: stained, with print show-through; cropped, faded, tightly bound; pages 275 and 276 torn with some loss of print; best copy available for photographing. Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
=======
